gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pacers 157, Hawks 152
gameRecap.excerpt: Tyrese Haliburton (37 points, 16 assists, nine 3pt. FG) and the Pacers defeat Trae Young (38 points, eight assists, five 3pt. FG) and the Hawks, 157-152.  Buddy Hield added 24 points and six 3pt. FG for the Pacers in the victory, while Dejounte Murray added 28 points, five assists and four 3pt. FG for the Hawks in the losing effort.  The Pacers improve to 8-5, 3-0 in IST, while the Hawks fall to 6-7, 1-2 in the IST.
